title: Introducing FizzBee: Simplifying Formal Methods for All
author: Jayaprabhakar Kadarkarai
description: You might have heard of TLA+, but how do you use it for debugging? FizzBee is a new formal methods system that you can grasp in just a weekend.
cntitle: FizzBee 简介：为所有人简化形式化方法
cndescription: 您可能听说过 TLA+，但如何使用它进行调试？FizzBee 是一种新的形式化方法系统，您可以在一个周末内掌握它。
